pullRequest.body:
---

I verified that no declaration disappeared by writing a simple (and ~very show~) script that prints all names in the environment, then running `diff` on two outputs.

UPD: the script was slow because of `#eval`. Turning it into a proper executable made it run in 4s.
See https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/channel/287929-mathlib4/topic/Lean-based.20.22changed.20names.22.20script.3F/with/505878898 and https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/channel/270676-lean4/topic/What's.20the.20right.20way.20to.20print.20lots.20of.20lines.3F/with/505878407

GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

https://leanprover-community.github.io/contribute/index.html

In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR
if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> List.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]

-->
- [x] depends on: #22468

### PR summary [110a86af47](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/22461/commits/110a86af472d4e7508dc2de2d26dcaa5a3b18979)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ comap_inv_atBot`
`+ comap_inv_atTop`
`+ comap_mabs_atTop`
`+ map_inv_atBot`
`+ map_inv_atTop`
`+ tendsto_atBot_mul_const_left`
`+ tendsto_atBot_mul_const_right`
`+ tendsto_atBot_mul_left_of_ge`
`+ tendsto_atBot_mul_left_of_ge'`
`+ tendsto_atBot_mul_right_of_ge`
`+ tendsto_atBot_mul_right_of_ge'`
`+ tendsto_atTop_mul_const_left`
`+ tendsto_atTop_mul_const_right`
`+ tendsto_atTop_mul_left_of_le`
`+ tendsto_atTop_mul_left_of_le'`
`+ tendsto_atTop_mul_right_of_le`
`+ tendsto_atTop_mul_right_of_le'`
`+ tendsto_inv_atBot_atTop`
`+ tendsto_inv_atBot_iff`
`+ tendsto_inv_atTop_atBot`
`+ tendsto_inv_atTop_iff`
`+ tendsto_mabs_atBot_atTop`
`+ tendsto_mabs_atTop_atTop`
`- comap_abs_atTop`
`- comap_neg_atBot`
`- comap_neg_atTop`
`- map_neg_atBot`
`- map_neg_atTop`
`- tendsto_abs_atBot_atTop`
`- tendsto_abs_atTop_atTop`
`- tendsto_atBot_add_const_left`
`- tendsto_atBot_add_const_right`
`- tendsto_atBot_add_left_of_ge`
`- tendsto_atBot_add_left_of_ge'`
`- tendsto_atBot_add_right_of_ge`
`- tendsto_atBot_add_right_of_ge'`
`- tendsto_atTop_add_const_left`
`- tendsto_atTop_add_const_right`
`- tendsto_atTop_add_left_of_le`
`- tendsto_atTop_add_left_of_le'`
`- tendsto_atTop_add_right_of_le`
`- tendsto_atTop_add_right_of_le'`
`- tendsto_neg_atBot_atTop`
`- tendsto_neg_atBot_iff`
`- tendsto_neg_atTop_atBot`
`- tendsto_neg_atTop_iff`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

---

<details><summary>No changes to technical debt.</summary>

You can run this locally as
```
./scripts/technical-debt-metrics.sh pr_summary
```
* The `relative` value is the weighted *sum* of the differences with weight given by the *inverse* of the current value of the statistic.
* The `absolute` value is the `relative` value divided by the total sum of the inverses of the current values (i.e. the weighted *average* of the differences).
</details>

This PR/issue depends on:
* ~~leanprover-community/mathlib4#22468~~
By **[Dependent Issues](https://github.com/z0al/dependent-issues)** (ðŸ¤–). Happy coding!
